script.name: !plugin.autotrade.delivery
script.description: Autotrade - Upgrade delivery by NPC service

line.comment: * v6: Starting Goner ship BEFORE flying to meetingpoint (Gnasirator, 02.03.2012)
* v8: Script now chooses a suitable ship type for the amount of cargo (16.05.12)
* 25% of the price for the service
* TODO: do I need to do this for {Jumpgate Quantifier} too?
* Only do in regular mode. not at first start with lvl 1 for buying EC
* If trader hasn't earned anough to afford upgrade, reduce amount
* find station closest to me and nearest gate
* TODO: getting a warning that $upgrade.ship has not been set
* it has been in the subroutine start.ship. Perhaps declare as null earlier and add a check for == null ?
* delivery ship will check for payment
* now check ship types if the upgrade shipment + fuel fits in it
* total amount of cargo space needed in upgrade ship
* this is to end the get.ship.type.stats subroutine
* Ship too small, now try an M4
* if still too little cargo, try a small TS
* well ... go big or go home, Snotra it is.
* I am blocking the delivery ship from docking, undock temporarily
* if chosen upgrade ship type is not available due to mods intalled,choose another
* Don't know what mod is intalled

sval.val: Autotrade - Upgrade delivery by NPC service
v6: Starting Goner ship BEFORE flying to meetingpoint (Gnasirator, 02.03.2012)
v8: Script now chooses a suitable ship type for the amount of cargo (16.05.12)
25% of the price for the service
TODO: do I need to do this for {Jumpgate Quantifier} too?
Only do in regular mode. not at first start with lvl 1 for buying EC
If trader hasn't earned anough to afford upgrade, reduce amount
find station closest to me and nearest gate
TODO: getting a warning that $upgrade.ship has not been set
it has been in the subroutine start.ship. Perhaps declare as null earlier and add a check for == null ?
delivery ship will check for payment
now check ship types if the upgrade shipment + fuel fits in it
total amount of cargo space needed in upgrade ship
this is to end the get.ship.type.stats subroutine
Ship too small, now try an M4
if still too little cargo, try a small TS
well ... go big or go home, Snotra it is.
I am blocking the delivery ship from docking, undock temporarily
if chosen upgrade ship type is not available due to mods intalled,choose another
Don't know what mod is intalled
